Detailed Description

The functions to facilitate floating point FFT.

Function Documentation

void mmwavelib_chirpProcWin2DFxdpinFltOut ( uint32_t  fftSize1D,
int16_t  inWin,
void *  inoutPtr 
)

Function Name : mmwavelib_chirpProcWin2DFxdpinFltOut.

Description : Windowing function for 2D FFT per antenna per chirp, the input is fixed point complex, prepare for the input to floating point 2D FFT.
Parameters
[in]fftSize1D: 1D FFT size
[in]inWin: Input 2D windowing coefficient for this chirp, fixed point.
[in,out]inoutPtr: Input is 32 bits complex value, with int16 I/Q, Output is written in place, and it is floating point, in the same I/Q order as the input buffer
Returns
void
Precondition
(1) inoutPtr must be aligned to 8 byte boundary.
(2) Input is at the first half of the buffer pointed by inoutPtr, in 32 bits complex value,

Cycles 2.18*fftSize (cgt 8.1.3)

void mmwavelib_chirpProcWin2DFxdpinFltOut_IQswap ( uint32_t  fftSize1D,
int16_t  inWin,
void *  inoutPtr 
)

Function Name : mmwavelib_chirpProcWin2DFxdpinFltOut_IQswap.

Description : Windowing function for 2D FFT per antenna per chirp, the input is fixed point complex, output is floating point complex value with I/Q order swapped compared with I/Q order for input.
Parameters
[in]fftSize1D: 1D FFT size
[in]inWin: Input 2D windowing coefficient for this chirp, fixed point.
[in,out]inoutPtr: Input is 32 bits complex value, with int16 I/Q, Output is written in place, and it is floating point, in the swapped I/Q order.
Returns
void
Precondition
(1) inoutPtr must be aligned to 8 byte boundary.
(2) Input is at the first half of the buffer pointed by inoutPtr, with 32 bits complex value, real and imag are 16 bits.

Cycles 2.5 * fftSize (cgt 8.1.3)

void mmwavelib_dopplerProcWin2DFxdpinFltOut ( uint32_t  length,
int16_t *restrict  inputPtr,
int16_t *restrict  windowPtr,
float32_t *restrict  outputPtr 
)

Function Name : mmwavelib_dopplerProcWin2DFxdpinFltOut.

Description : Windowing function for fixed point complex input and floating point complex output.
Parameters
[in]length: the number of complex values in the input array.
[in]inputPtr: Pointer to 16-bit I/Q input array.
[in]windowPtr: Pointer to 16-bit real windowing coefficients buffer.
[out]outputPtr: Pointer to floating-point output buffer after windowing, with same I/Q order as the input I/Q buffer.
Returns
void
Precondition
(1) inputPtr and outputPtr must be aligned to 8 byte boundary.
(2) windowPtr must be aligned to 4 byte boundary.
(3) Window is assumed to be symmetric so only length/2 coefficients are needed.
(4) length must be multiple of 4.

Cycles 1.55*length + 45 (cgt 8.1.3)

void mmwavelib_dopplerProcWin2DFxdpinFltOut_IQswap ( uint32_t  length,
int16_t *restrict  inputPtr,
int16_t *restrict  windowPtr,
float32_t *restrict  outputPtr 
)

Function Name : mmwavelib_dopplerProcWin2DFxdpinFltOut_IQswap.

Description : Windowing function for fixed point complex input (16 bits I and Q), and the output is floating point complex output with swapped I/Q order.
Parameters
[in]length: the number of complex values in the input array.
[in]inputPtr: Pointer to 16-bit I/Q input array.
[in]windowPtr: Pointer to 16-bit real windowing coefficients buffer.
[out]outputPtr: Pointer to floating-point output buffer after windowing, with swapped I/Q order as the input I/Q buffer.
Returns
void
Precondition
(1) inputPtr and outputPtr must be aligned to 8 byte boundary.
(2) windowPtr must be aligned to 4 byte boundary.
(3) Window is assumed to be symmetric so only length/2 coefficients are needed.
(4) length must be multiple of 4.

Cycles 1.8 * length + 67 (cgt 8.1.3)

void mmwavelib_windowing1DFltp ( uint32_t  nSamplesValidPerChirp,
uint32_t  fftSize1D,
int16_t  fftWin1D[restrict],
int16_t *  inputPtr,
float32_t *  outputPtr 
)

Function Name : mmwavelib_windowing1DFltp.

Description : Windowing function for 1D FFT per antenna per chirp, prepare for the input to floating point 1D FFT.
Parameters
[in]nSamplesValidPerChirp: Number of valid samples per chirp
[in]fftSize1D: 1D FFT size, must be power of 2
[in]fftWin1D: Input pointer to Windowing real array (16 bit) of length nSamplesValidPerChirp/2+1. It is assumed the window is symmetric.
[in]inputPtr: Input 32 bits complex signal array, 16bits I/Q.
[out]outputPtr: Output complex signal array, floating point I/Q, same order as the input.
Returns
void
Precondition
(1)Input Windowing array (fftWin1D) is 4 byte aligned. (2)Input data (inputPtr) is 8 byte aligned.

Cycles 2.87*length+56(cgt 8.1.3)

void mmwavelib_windowing2DFltp ( uint32_t  fftSize1D,
float32_t  inWin,
float32_t  inOutPtr[restrict] 
)

Function Name : mmwavelib_windowing2DFltp.

Description : Windowing function for 2D FFT per antenna per chirp, prepare for the input to floating point 2D FFT.
Parameters
[in]fftSize1D: 1D FFT size
[in]inWin: Input 2D windowing coefficient for this chirp, in floating point.
[in,out]inOutPtr: Floating-point complex-value input array, Output is written inplace
Returns
void

Cycles 1.98*fftsize (cgt 8.1.3)
